DeathSteel::

He unhinged his wings and snapped them together creating his battle 
blade. He swirled it around his body, snun it over his head, brought 
id down, thrust it forward, towards the side, bring it up oover his 
head and back down. He then unsnapped them and reattached his wings 
to his shoulder blades. "I kill my enemies with a swift vengence. I 
spare no one in my wake and all who betray me feel the sharpness of 
my blade. What specific qualifications are you looking for? Killer, 
hunter, a mercenary perhaps? I have done them all. If your looking 
for a secretary, I'll go find another group." He said, with a note of 
sarcasm in that last part. He looked at Perceptor with a serious look 
on his face. "I am a warrior, pure and simple. I need no other skills 
other those needed to kill my foe."
